metadata.label: By CustomerId
metadata.comment: Links customer accounts with their corresponding orders, providing a comprehensive view of customer activity and spending.

metadata.description: Unique identifier for each customer in the database.
The first name of the customer.
The surname of the customer.
Contact number of the customer; Format is a standard phone number.
Email address of the customer; Used for communication and account-related notifications.
Two-letter ISO code representing the country of the customer.
Date when the customer account was opened; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Flags indicating the status or special conditions of the customer's account.
Unique identifier for each order placed by customers.
Unique identifier for the customer who placed the order.
Current status of the order, indicating its progress such as Finished, Started, or Approved.
Category of the order; Indicates the type of service or product associated with the order, such as Training, Research and Development, or Engineering.
Date when the order was placed; Format is YYYY-MM-DD.
Total monetary value of the order; Represents the cost associated with the order in currency.
Unique identifier for the customer who placed the order.
Unique identifier for the customer who placed the order.

metadata.label: Sum Amounts
metadata.comment: Aggregates customer data to summarize their order counts and total spending, while also providing account length and customer names.
